aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the presence of mandatory tags in the request

backup:changeablefordays.description: Filters access by the value of the ChangeableForDays parameter

backup:copytargetorgpaths.description: Filters access by the organization unit

backup:copytargets.description: Filters access by the ARN of a backup vault

backup:frameworkarns.description: Filters access by the Framework ARNs

backup:index.description: Filters access by the value of Index parameter

backup:maxretentiondays.description: Filters access by the value of the MaxRetentionDays parameter

backup:minretentiondays.description: Filters access by the value of the MinRetentionDays parameter

backup:mpaapprovalteamarn.description: Filters access by the MPA Approval Team ARN of a backup vault
